name: KCC Rumble Alpha Build
description:
KCC Rumble is a fighting game based on elements of Super Smash Bros, Kirby Battle Royale, and Kirby Fighters. It started out as a simple quarantine project, thought up in March of 2020, and teased in April. It is a project testing the capabilities of Scratch. It was created by CodeKirby and developed by everyone in the KCCR Studio. It is a game made by fans for fans.
Head over here for Linux and Mac builds.
https://gamejolt.com/games/KCCRumble/564288
